scenario_text.value: Aoi!
Thank goodness you’re all right!
There are...two Labramon?
Careful, Aoi! That one’s a fake!

That’s rich, coming from you, you faker! You
know she’ll know the difference!

Um, what should I do, Takuma? Are both of
them real?

(Shoot, it’s hard to tell them apart just by
looking at them. Which is the fake?)
(What describes the real Labramon?)
She knows Aoi the best.
She loves Aoi to bits.
I don’t know.

The real one should know you the best. There
must be something only the two of you know.

Something only the two of us know... Oh, I’ve
got it!

Labramon? What have I been doing for everyone
inside the school?
Huh? Um... Like taking care of me?

That’s easy, the cooking! Your cooking is
crazy good!
Heheh, well that settles it.

The real Labramon just adores you, Aoi. She
would hate to lose you, wouldn’t she?
I see. I think I know...

Hey Labramon, how would you feel if I became
a sacrifice?
Oh man, that’d be the best!

No, Aoi, there’s no way you can sacrifice
yourself! I’d be crushed!
Heheh, well that settles it!
Sorry, I really don’t know.

I see... Then I’ll have to rely on my
intuition.
(The real Labramon is...)
On the right!
On the left!
This one!
Ha! I knew you’d be able to tell us apart!
Hmph...

Ah, Seadramon! So you were transformed the
whole time!

How could you tell... Damn, I’ll remember
this!
Ah, he ran away!

Let’s leave him be for now. It’s enough that
we’re reunited with the real Labramon.
Hee hee, what an idiot...
Wait, what? The gas is getting thicker...
(This is bad... My consciousness is fading...)
